Detailed Description

Date:
08-20-2001
Author:
Eric Crahen
Version:
1.0

This is a simle wrapper for any Iterator. It will filter the results reachable through this Iterator by skipping any values that are not comparable (ie filter.compareTo(nextValue) != 0) to the given filter.
